Name: deadzone
Description: This room is for debugging! You may not enter.

Name: Misty Riverside
Description: The air is quiet and the trees grow thick overhead. In each direction the murky river disappears into mist and darkness.

Name: Tunnel of Trees
Description: A gate marks the boundary between the forest and the plains. The incongruous “SHOP” door has a cool glow.

Name: Torii Gate
Description: The Torii gate standing here radiates an aura of spiritual significance. Piles of scrap and garbage rise like mountains on the horizon.

Name: Vending Machine
Description: A vending machine stands deep in the scrap, well stocked and operating despite the remote location and cut power cord.

Name: Restricted Area
Description: A restricted area, but no one is watching. Follow this road lined with cherry trees to reach an office complex.

Name: Labs Entrance
Description: The exterior of this building was designed to resemble a shrine almost as much as an office.

Name: Forest: Old Growth
Description: You step into the forest and seem to enter a primordial age. The buzz of giant insects overwhelms your hearing.

Name: Forest: Insect Node
Description: The buzzing is loudest here. This mound draws insects of all types toward it. They writhe together in a trance.

Name: Temple by the Waterfall
Description: A humble shrine lends this waterfall basin a peaceful aura, but the air has an unpleasant aroma like dirty laundry,

Name: Scrap Confluence
Description: A collection of strange and hard to identify objects buried deep in the scrapyard. It could be dangerous to get close.

Name: Convenience Store
Description: The glowing blue door seems to lead to a convenience store. Where is this? That “Exit” sign might let you leave.

Name: Temple Cave
Description: A cave behind the waterfall. Friendly statues line a path to the back of the cave, away from ancient-looking temple ruins.

Name: Techno Temple
Description: Inside the ruined temple. This place might have been traditional once, but now it sparks and rumbles with technology.

Name: Cave Crossroads
Description: Deep in the cave the path branches. The bioluminescent fungi make it nearly as bright as day. You can hear bells in the air.

Name: Temple of the Wheel
Description: Half eroded stone and mossy growth, half gleaming metal and glowing crystal. Whether temple or technology, it unsettles you.

Name: Lost Skeleton
Description: A crumbling human skeleton lies prone on the ground. It looks to have been decomposing for decades.

Name: Trash-Strewn Graves
Description: Ancient gravestones emerge from the thinning piles of trash at the farthest edge of the scrapyard.

Name: Misty Forest Path
Description: Dense mist and canopy blocks the sky. It would be impossible to navigate in this forest of illusion. Just follow the path.

Name: Scrapyard Entrance
Description: The detritus ahead stands in dark mountain peaks. A path has been dug for you through the towering piles of garbage.

Name: Scrapyard Exit
Description: A literal and metaphorical fork in the road. Nature, man’s work and its leftovers.

Name: Road To Labs
Description: A paved road curled between green hills. The blacktop cracks as the world around it grows.

Name: Forest Entrance
Description: The forest canopy blots out the sky above. An eerie silence overwhelms the expected sounds of life.

Name: Deeper Into Scrap
Description: Deeper into the scrapyard down a narrow path. After every turn, the mountains of trash grow taller and more precarious.

Name: Elder Path
Description: The forest grows so thick that the road is barely visible at times. The air is still, but the trees sway and twist in the darkness.

Name: Parting Path
Description: It seems as if the trees are parting to clear a path ahead, then shuffling back together.

Name: Hollow Path
Description: The mist is thinner here and the sky can be seen through holes in the canopy.

Name: Scrap Paths
Description: The mountains of trash look more like hills, but the forest is no longer visible on the horizon.

Name: Murky Forest Path
Description: The forest is dark and impenetrable. Thick tree trunks stretch high above.

Name: Clearing
Description: A secluded clearing, away from both the illusory mists of the labyrinthine forest and the towering trash maze of the scrapyard.

Name: Ancient Forest Entrance
Description: The undergrowth here is very thick; there’s only a few paths to follow through the trees…. The forest here feels packed, almost a jungle.

Name: Scrap-Littered Undergrowth
Description: There are fragments of scrap metal littered around the forest here.

Name: Airplane Crash
Description: The wreckage of a plane is resting here, deep in the forest.

Name: Blooming Tree
Description: This tree has been….. struck by lightning, perhaps?

Name: Plane Interior
Description: The air inside this airplane is…. sterile. Something’s wrong here.

Name: Shady Path
Description: The path runs along the edge of the forest for a little while. It’s quiet here.

Name: Butterfly Forest
Description: The forest here grows thicker once more. The blue butterflies seem particularly common in this place.

Name: River Crossing
Description: This seems like a natural spot to try to cross the river… and indeed, there was once a bridge…

Name: Scrap Trees
Description: A clearing on the border between the forest and scrapyard. You see a shovel and a notebook lying on the grass, each bisected down the middle. The cuts are perfectly clean.

Name: Musty Forest Path
Description: Dead stumps and knotted trees tell you the forest here is in declining health. Giant centipedes march back and forth; a living trail that leads deeper into the woods.

Name: Centipedes
Description: A dark hollow beneath a dying tree choked with polypore fungi. Mushrooms coat every tree in this part of the forest. The centipedes seem to like this place.

Name: Deeper Forest Path
Description: A stretch of forest road with light canopy and open sky. Wildflowers grow just off the path.

Name: Burning Room
Description:
In the center of the hut, a large cauldron bubbles over a low fire. Dried flowers and herbs hang overhead, and jars with suspicious labels sit on a shelf in the back.

Someone was just here brewing something, but the hut is empty for now.

Name: Forest Hut
Description: Smoke rises from a small reed hut that sits tucked behind boulders in a secluded part of the forest. The door is open.

Name: Marketplace
Description: A strange machine adorned with Asphodel flowers sits here, deep in the forest. What could it be for?

loadbearing: After Co-Op Completion: The tunnel is clear and the roof is stable. The blockade seems to have been deliberate. The air is humid and salty. A light breeze blows.
Name: Boulder Tunnel
Description: The air is humid and salty. Stalagmites and stalactites crust over ancient stone construction. The tunnel ahead is blocked by what seems to be a roof collapse.

Name: Slippery Pit
Description: These ladders prove you’re not the first to explore this cave.
Exit Refs: Boulder Tunnel (https://www.notion.so/Boulder-Tunnel-1fa0220c388480fc8994d34833d1beb5?pvs=21), Flood Mural (https://www.notion.so/Flood-Mural-1fa0220c3884804fa583d42eb6c0aaed?pvs=21), Lotus Pool (https://www.notion.so/Lotus-Pool-1fa0220c388480538393ffd1b61ba755?pvs=21)

Name: Lotus Pool
Description: Unsteady lights glimmer just outside your vision like will-o’-the-wisps. You can see a cluster of small craters filled with water. A colorful lotus flower grows in the largest pool.

Name: Still Stream
Description: An arcing tunnel filled with still and shallow water. The air is salty and has a faint taste of metal.

Name: Shabby Deck
Description: An observation deck above a pool of still water. Albino centipedes scurry away from a pile of bones as you enter. A grappling hook has been attached to the deck through a broken window.

Name: Hatch to Nowhere
Description: This facility seems ransacked as well as timeworn. A reinforced door is ajar, a tunnel up into the room above is broken, machinery has wires ripped out, a sticky ooze seeps from the vents, and spiderwebs fill the corners. The red light in the ceiling is dead, but it would flash a warning if there were any power.
Exit Refs: Shabby Deck (https://www.notion.so/Shabby-Deck-1fa0220c3884808787a0eaa68a2ee3b0?pvs=21), Broken Tube (https://www.notion.so/Broken-Tube-1fa0220c388480288f1fdb24b0f3f785?pvs=21), Treasure Hoard (https://www.notion.so/Treasure-Hoard-2580220c38848037a292cf6e463af10b?pvs=21)

Name: Broken Tube
Description: Some kind of observation and testing environment. Readings indicate everything in this facility is ancient; even older than the graveyard under the scrap. Must be a bug.

loadbearing: After Co-Op Completion: The narrow room is flanked by high walls cut from black crystal. Gargantuan stone stairs lead to an ornate engraved door. The great door has been pried open just a crack, but that’s all you need.
Name: Engraved Door
Description: The narrow room is flanked by high walls cut from black crystal. Gargantuan stone stairs lead to an ornate engraved door. No matter how hard you and your kami try, you won’t get it open without more help.
Exit Refs: Broken Tube (https://www.notion.so/Broken-Tube-1fa0220c388480288f1fdb24b0f3f785?pvs=21), Flood Mural (https://www.notion.so/Flood-Mural-1fa0220c3884804fa583d42eb6c0aaed?pvs=21), Temple of the Wheel (https://www.notion.so/Temple-of-the-Wheel-1b90220c388481528f4bfb1bc5cd3b61?pvs=21)

Name: Flood Mural
Description: A flat steel wall with a high-tech door cuts through an otherwise natural cave room. The door is splintered into pieces and the frame is broken. There’s a large mural painted across the curved rear wall.

Name: Fungus Garden
Description: Two types of colorful fungus are cultivated here along the path. Seems like a garden.

loadbearing: After Co-Op Completion: This fork in the road is flanked with fast-growing fungi. The overgrown mushrooms blocking the road have been cleared away. The road north passes through a natural cave, and the road east through a reinforced tunnel.
Name: Thriving Mushrooms
Description: This fork in the road is flanked with fast-growing fungi. The mushrooms are slightly luminescent, and have steel-hard stalks. Exits to the north and east are blocked by the fungi.
Exit Refs: Fungus Garden (https://www.notion.so/Fungus-Garden-1fa0220c38848051be2ee2f0f14c7914?pvs=21), Toadstool Platforms (https://www.notion.so/Toadstool-Platforms-1fa0220c38848091b319ec71a9d90fd6?pvs=21), Reinforced Tunnel (https://www.notion.so/Reinforced-Tunnel-1fa0220c388480778ed2e80f3b29696b?pvs=21)

Name: Toadstool Platforms
Description: The stony mushrooms here have grown to a truly gargantuan size. The air is dry. A rope ladder hangs down from a cliff high above.

Name: Abandoned Campsite
Description: An abandoned campsite. There’s a charcoal drawing of a strange fish-like creature on one wall.

Name: Radiant Crystal
Description: A blue crystal that radiates with a soft glow illuminating the cave. Roots grasp tightly around the crystal, supporting it against the ceiling.

Name: Flower Mural
Description: Someone has burned a pile of books to make charcoal soot, then used a brush to draw a flower on the wall.

Name: Geometric Cliffs
Description: Sheer cliffs of jagged, geometric rock. The room is dark, but illuminated by a lantern glowing blue.

Name: Canyon Bridge
Description: A rickety bridge over a dark canyon. The cave exits from the west to an overlook. People in the past must have climbed down this ladder to reach the bridge to the tunnel north. Another ladder was used to climb even deeper down into the dark.
Exit Refs: Geometric Cliffs (https://www.notion.so/Geometric-Cliffs-1fa0220c3884803db4d9f70bf99e92d1?pvs=21), Reinforced Tunnel (https://www.notion.so/Reinforced-Tunnel-1fa0220c388480778ed2e80f3b29696b?pvs=21), Giant’s Palm (https://www.notion.so/Giant-s-Palm-1fa0220c3884801e91ead22f7e0a3425?pvs=21)

Name: Reinforced Tunnel
Description: A mined and reinforced tunnel. There’s a note posted on the wall and a single book tucked behind a pole. Fast-growing luminous mushrooms peek through from the room to the west.

loadbearing: After Co-Op Completion: The dark bottom of the canyon. The giant skeletal hand seems to welcome your entry.
Name: Giant’s Palm
Description: The dark bottom of the canyon. A cave mouth is blocked by what appears to be a giant skeletal hand. The hand is fixed in place by some force and cannot be easily moved.

Name: Guardian Skull
Description: A giant’s skull is embedded into one wall and has roots growing through it. The rest of the giant’s spine and ribcage is used to line a large pit in the ground.

Name: Sacrarium
Description: A flooded and ruined temple built around the spine and pelvis of a giant skeleton. Black liquid floods the pit. The temple columns have crumbled.

Name: Treasure Hoard
Description: You find yourself in a medieval castle built from glassy purple bricks. In front of you is a large hoard of glittering treasure. You’re rich! But who uses gold in this economy?
Exit Refs: Trophies of the Hunt (https://www.notion.so/Trophies-of-the-Hunt-2580220c38848098ade9d9b808a20983?pvs=21), Hatch to Nowhere (https://www.notion.so/Hatch-to-Nowhere-1fa0220c388480c8ac7ef72d5d701d1d?pvs=21)

Name: Trophies of the Hunt
Description: Stuffed trophies of strange creatures rest on pedestals and sit mounted on walls all across this side of the room.

Name: Scenic View
Description: You can see this castle is on an island of some kind. The tower you’re standing in is impossibly high in the air. Dragons fly through the clouds below.
